review: It worked well at first but then it started messing up if i out a video in full screen, soon after it wouldnt connect to Netflix and now it wont even connect to YouTube. Your better off with a HDMI cable.
author: Nestor HUrtazo

review: Great product. When using for a long time, it tends to heat up. Very hot to the touch. May need to pause or unplug to let it cool. But easy to connect and use.
author: tbone74

review: awsome little device especially now after there have been many apps written for it.
author: sylvester

review: Its a chromecast - what can I say. I have been using this for 2+ years and still ove it.
author: Kevin H.

review: Works well for streaming movies from my phone to TV and quick delivery
author: Jim A.

review: We love our Google Chromecast.  It was pretty simple to set up and our devices are now connected to our TV at all times.  I love being able to quickly stream YouTube videos, Pandora stations, Netflix, etc.
author: Seri Stelly Frioux
